summary: The module defines a set of lightweight helper functions that serve as overrides for local and remote execution contexts, handling custom exception and class serialization/deserialization as well as simple attribute get/set and print operations. These utilities are used to emulate and test Metaflow's environment escape behavior.
business_intent: Provide mock implementations for serialization, deserialization, and attribute manipulation that enable reliable testing of Metaflow's environment escape mechanism across local and remote environments.
